home.headline: Game Developer
home.subline: I'm Lex, a gameplay engineer. I make games in Unity and Godot.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Lex Kinser is a Kansas City gameplay engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant design solutions. Her work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

CodeAlgo.achievements: Led the design, development, and implementation of an educational game, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.

Shopify.achievements: Laid the foundations for enabling merchants to add video backgrounds to their shop on the mobile application.
